This coronavirus pandemic exposes the incredible weakness and dysfunctionality of our current health care system.

We are the only major country not to guarantee health care to all our people.

We need Medicare for All. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1239343360772628483/img/275HcXd-Rri5gIht.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1239343360772628483/vid/480x270/jtWMsBLwoKgODpel.mp4?tag=13

Now we must make all public universities, colleges and trade schools tuition-free for all, cancel all student debt, and fund it with a small tax on Wall Street speculation. https://twitter.com/kylegriffin1/status/1239299125939666946 QT @kylegriffin1 Joe Biden has said he'll support a policy to make public colleges and universities tuition-free for students with family income under $125,000.

The position is a significant shift in the direction of Bernie Sanders. https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/2020-election/courting-progressives-biden-shifts-policy-stances-free-college-bankruptcy-n1159636

Across CA, 4.7M adults and 2M children live in food-insecure households. It’s more important than ever that we support our food banks and those who feed our neighbors and children. Donate to a food bank near you: http://cafoodbanks.org.

40% of Americans can’t afford a $400 emergency, & that’s before COVID.

The faster we addresses wage & rent concerns for people & small businesses, the faster we can get everyone to self-isolate.

This is basic. The truth matters.

We will rise to meet this challenge together.

In 2008 when we had the Wall Street bailout, the people on top did very well. This time around, let us learn that lesson and pay attention to the working families of this country. #DemDebate

Today, the choice for millions of Americans is this:

Choose between your next paycheck & caring for your sick child.

Choose between going in to work sick & having to skip a meal.

Choose between your health or your family’s financial security.

We need paid sick leave.
The debate starts soon on CNN. Follow along with updates on our live blog here: https://berniesanders.com/debate/

Be kind. 
Look after your neighbors. 
We’re all in this together.

Seniors and people with compromised health are at greater risk from #COVID19. How much greater? Of the first 803 people the Italian government reported who have died, 98% were 60 or older. Data from other countries also show that older people have a much higher risk of death.
